definition: decaffeinated/decaf/see also 無咖啡因|无咖啡因[wu2 ka1 fei1 yin1]

sentences.english: Also, try to limit your intake of caffeine and alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 你也要限制你的咖啡因和酒精的攝入量。

sentences.english: By the time afternoon rolls around, you’re in caffeine withdrawal.
sentences.chinese: 下午時光流逝，你沉浸在咖啡因裏面。

sentences.english: And this with the cigarette butt in it, is that decaf?
sentences.chinese: 對了，而這杯有菸屁股的是無咖啡因的嗎？

sentences.english: Drink much more than that and the caffeine can dehydrate you or raise your blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 而喝得太多，咖啡因會導致你口渴或者升高你的血壓。

sentences.english: This also includes other caffeinated drinks, by the way.
sentences.chinese: 順便提一下，這也包括其他含咖啡因的飲料。

sentences.english: Conclusions Caffine had remarkable enhancement effect in cisplatin—induced apoptosis of osteosarcoma cell and osteosarcoma cases.
sentences.chinese: 結論咖啡因有促進順鉑誘導骨肉瘤細胞凋亡的作用。

sentences.english: Whether caffeine banishes cellulite is less clear.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡因是否可以減少脂肪組織尚未闡明。

sentences.english: Sodas with caffeine and those that are acidic are even worse.
sentences.chinese: 含咖啡因的汽水或是酸性的汽水更是不能喝。

sentences.english: B. Different findings of Lotan Shilo and a team about caffeine.
sentences.chinese: 關於咖啡因Shilo羅坍和研究小組有不同的結果。

sentences.english: But avoid sodas, especially caffeinated ones.
sentences.chinese: 但是，避免汽水，尤其是含咖啡因的。

sentences.english: Biggest of all are carbonated soft drinks, 70% of which are caffeinated.
sentences.chinese: 分量最大的還是碳痠軟飲料，70%都含有咖啡因。

sentences.english: Switch to decaf until you've been cigarette-free for two months.
sentences.chinese: 直到你兩個月不吸菸了再去碰咖啡因。

sentences.english: When we want to feel energized, we think about caffeine.
sentences.chinese: 當我們想感覺亢奮時，會想到咖啡因。

sentences.english: But you have that caffeine making you more alert, so you keep drinking.
sentences.chinese: 但那些咖啡因會讓你更亢奮，所以你會接着喝。

sentences.english: Vinnie: Those are sesame doughnuts with extra caffeine added.
sentences.chinese: 那些是加了咖啡因油炸麪包圈。

definition: alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
